CustomField.description: An email message to alert recipients that a deadline approaches for completing an envelope. This is sent only to recipients who have not yet completed the envelope.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicate how many days prior to expiration you want an email message to alert recipients that a deadline approaches for completion. This is sent only to recipients who have not yet completed the transaction.
CustomField.label: Warn of expiration in N day(s) prior
